channel.title: Can someone help? im having trouble with a step in creating my server
channel.description:
Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
ok see now, i go into advanced, but it doesnt say gaming, and when i go into a different gaming tab i dont see the form to fill the information in, can someone tell me some things i might be doing wrong?
